title: SET_GAMEPLAY_VEHICLE_HINT
content:
0xA2297E18F3E71C2E0x2C9A11D8// SetGameplayVehicleHint
void SET_GAMEPLAY_VEHICLE_HINT(Vehicle vehicle, float offsetX, float offsetY, float offsetZ, BOOL p4, int time, int easeInTime, int easeOutTime);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to focus on.offsetX: Position offset XoffsetY: Position offset YoffsetZ: Position offset Zp4: time: Effect durationeaseInTime: Effect fade in durationeaseOutTime: EFfect fade out durationFocuses the camera on the specified vehicle.
codeBlocks:
// SetGameplayVehicleHint
void SET_GAMEPLAY_VEHICLE_HINT(Vehicle vehicle, float offsetX, float offsetY, float offsetZ, BOOL p4, int time, int easeInTime, int easeOutTime);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_GAMEPLAY_VEHICLE_HINT
SetGameplayVehicleHint(vehicle, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, false, 0, 0, 0)
